textBox.richText: Due to the size of this site, I am listing here, Site Guide, all the pages that have initial content on them and are ready for viewing. Each page listed on the Site Guide is also linked elsewhere on bylochacon.com by topic, type of resource and blog post. Also, I just fixed the email links on all the pages (I think), so it should work now. The RSS feed is still broken, as is the google search on each page. I’ll work on getting those up and running as soon as I can figure out how. I generally work on one page a day, but am continuing to add links to other pages as I find them. If you email suggestions, I would be happy to add them right away. Today I have finished the Links for History Humor, Fun & Games. Teachers, please use these resources with care, as every silly website does not have one-hundred percent student-friendly material.
